vulnerability_findings.name: use-abi-encodecall-instead-of-encodewithselector
vulnerability_findings.message: To guarantee arguments type safety it is recommended to use `abi.encodeCall` instead of `abi.encodeWithSelector`.

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in LibLiquidityProviderRichErrors.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.6.5 (LibLiquidityProviderRichErrors.sol#21): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:
function LiquidityProviderIncompleteSellError(

        address providerAddress,

        address makerToken,

        address takerToken,

        uint256 sellAmount,

        uint256 boughtAmount,

        uint256 minBuyAmount

    )

        internal

        pure

        returns (bytes memory)

    {

        return abi.encodeWithSelector(

            bytes4(keccak256("LiquidityProviderIncompleteSellError(address,address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256)")),

            providerAddress,

            makerToken,

            takerToken,

            sellAmount,

            boughtAmount,

            minBuyAmount

        );
